title: Doing a giveaway :)
body:
Hey, Im MrKillerKow aka LethalDwarf. I started a youtube channel a couple days ago and I'm doing a giveaway to boost my subscribers. Right now, i am giving a 10 dollar league card away. To enter, you have to like the Giveaway video, comment your league name and server and subscribe. If i hit 50 or 100 subscribers by Wednesday (when the giveaway starts) I will increase the amount of the league card (50 subs = 25 dollar league card, 100 subs = 50 dollar league card). Please subscribe and share so we can hit as many subscriptions as possible. Thank you!

For people who want the link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6H1dsenV5I0

replies.body:
Some tips!
First off using demo software to record is a big nono. If you can afford to do a giveaway you should be able to afford the small price for a program like Dxtory or Fraps.
Second, to become a popular League channel most people are either very entertaining or very good at the game. If you're going down the entertainment route then I'd highly suggest recording your voice while playing.
Another thing, you should never upload videos that are glitched out like the 'Outrunning Vi's Ult' video which has become off-centered at some point.

Good luck getting the channel going!

> [{quoted}](name=Sailor Jupiter,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Rm05XAsE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-11T07:18:43.907+0000)
>
> Some tips!
> First off using demo software to record is a big nono. If you can afford to do a giveaway you should be able to afford the small price for a program like Dxtory or Fraps.
> Second, to become a popular League channel most people are either very entertaining or very good at the game. If you're going down the entertainment route then I'd highly suggest recording your voice while playing.
> Another thing, you should never upload videos that are glitched out like the 'Outrunning Vi's Ult' video which has become off-centered at some point.
> 
> Good luck getting the channel going!

Thanks for the advice :D. As i have a Mac, I'm limited to recording softwares but, soon i will be getting Camtasia. Im not very entertaining when I use my voice in recording, because i don't know what to say and they just get bored. And yeh, I'm going to delete that Vi and Quinn video, i don't think it deserves to be on my channel :P
What is this, 2008? Using notepad instead of your voice, rofl.
